title: About Repo — REPO RECORDS
text: View fullsize AboutRepo Records was opened by Dan Matherson in 1986 in Wayne, PA. A second shop opened in Bryn Mawr in 1989, both specializing in punk rock and indie LPs, CD's and cassettes. In 1998, Repo opened it’s doors at 538 South street where we stayed until 2017. When an opportunity arose to move into a bigger storefront on our block, we jumped at the chance to pack up our expanding inventory and start fresh yet again at 506 South Street (the old home of Agent Aloha). We are now in our 38th year and have expanded into hosting events and more!Repo is a smallish shop but we've got a wide variety of music, both new and used, ranging from metal to jazz, punk rock to hip hop, soul, r&b, indie, and classic rock, you name it. We're always on the lookout for used records and Cd's, call us at anytime to set up a meeting...or just come on in! Also check out or event page to see up and coming in-store shows and album signings. Follow our instagram (@reporecords) for the most up to date news. Repo Records506 South. St.Philadelphia, PA 19147 215-627-3775Monday-Friday 11am - 8pmSaturday 11am - 8pmSunday 11am-7pm ←Move left→Move right↑Move up↓Move down+Zoom in-Zoom outHomeJump left by 75%EndJump right by 75%Page UpJump up by 75%Page DownJump down by 75%Keyboard shortcutsMap DataMap data ©2026 GoogleMap data ©2026 Google2 km Click to toggle between metric and imperial unitsTermsReport a map error

title: UPCOMING EVENTS — REPO RECORDS
text: Feb 21 7:30 PM19:30 MITSKI Early Listening Event Saturday, February 21, 2026 7:30 PM 8:30 PM 19:30 20:30 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us for an extra special Mitski early listening party on Saturday Feb 21st. This one is at 7:30 pm and we’ll let in up to 50 fans to experience the new album almost a whole week before release date! Here’s some more details:Mitski's new album NOTHING'S ABOUT TO HAPPEN TO ME finds Mitski immersing herself in a rich narrative whose main character is a reclusive woman in an unkempt house. Outside of her home, she is a deviant; inside of her home, she is free.The album comes February 27, but record stores around the world are opening the door to that home -- Tansy House -- on FEBRUARY 21 for TANSY HOUSE LISTENING EVENTS. You're invited to bring your favorite pens, stickers and crafting supplies and settle in for an advance listen to the new album and some creative time with your thoughts and impressions of the music. Then put it all together for a community art project that may just be featured on the @mitskiverseOf course, there will be free giveaways -- souvenirs and reminders of the time you spent with friends as you #listentomitski -- and a prize too. And you'll be able to order the new record and get a limited edition sticker on street date *while supplies last. Slide through to find the store you'll visit and check in with them for times and more details. View Event → 0 Likes Share Feb 25 6:30 PM18:30 BRUNO MARS Early Listening Party Wednesday, February 25, 2026 6:30 PM 7:30 PM 18:30 19:30 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us for an early listening party for the new Bruno Mars album (dropping on 2/27/26) on Wednesday 2/25/26 at 6:30 pm. We will play the album in full, and attendees will get some swag (while supplies last) and be able to enter a raffle for a prize given out at the end of the party. All are welcome to come out (no purchase necessary to attend). Bruno Mars has also been named this year’s Record Store Day 2026 ambassador! View Event → 0 Likes Share Mar 3 1:00 PM13:00 NEP (Noelle) Record Signing/Meet n Greet Tuesday, March 3, 2026 1:00 PM 2:00 PM 13:00 14:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Come meet Nep here at Repo on Tuesday March 3rd at 1 pm! She’ll be here signing her new record “Noelle” (you can purchase the album here at Repo that day). She’ll be playing a show later that night at World Cafe Live.RSVP for a guaranteed spot at the signing HERE! View Event → 0 Likes Share Feb 13 8:30 PM20:30 Graham Repulski and Left Circles Friday, February 13, 2026 8:30 PM 9:30 PM 20:30 21:30 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS What: Graham Repulski and Left Circles playing electric and acoustic tunes live for you here at Repo. (This event is a kick-off to Forever Since Heedfest which takes place on Feb 14th) This is directed toward Guided By Voices fans!When: Friday February 13th, shows starting at 8:30 pm (be in line by 8 pm)Where: Repo Records 506 South Street Philadelphia PA. This is a record shop, not a venue, so please be advised that it is a small space with merchandise (large bags must be checked at counter) and it is standing room only. And yes we encourage shopping during the event if you’re so inclined.How do I get a ticket: You can purchase a physical ticket AT Repo Records for $18, OR you can tickets online here: PURCHASE TICKETS HERE View Event → 0 Likes Share Feb 3 6:00 PM18:00 JOJI Listening Event Tuesday, February 3, 2026 6:00 PM 7:00 PM 18:00 19:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us to listen to the new Joji album “Piss in the Wind” on Tuesday February 3rd at 6 pm (3 days before release date). You’ll be able to hear the new album before the rest of the world, grab some free swag (while supplies last) and enter to win a special raffle prize that we’ll pull at the end of the event. All are welcome! View Event → 0 Likes Share Jan 30 6:00 PM18:00 JOYCE MANOR Listening Event Friday, January 30, 2026 6:00 PM 7:00 PM 18:00 19:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS **UPDATE, date has changed due to snow delays (was originally on Thursday at 5 pm)Join us for a listening party for Joyce Manor’s new album “I Used to Go to This Bar” on Friday January 30th at 6 pm! Come hang out, shop, chill while we play the entire new album for you.This is a free event for anyone who is a fan of Joyce Manor, and we will have giveaways and usually a raffle drawing at the end of event (more info on these via our Instagram once we know what they will be shipping to us!)Attendees will be able to purchase the album (until we run out) and take home with them. These will be first come first served, and since this is release day we will have them out starting at 11 am so there is no guarantee (unless you pre-ordered) that any will be left by 6 pm.**Note: Joyce Manor themselves will NOT be at the event. View Event → 0 Likes Share Jan 23 5:00 PM17:00 MEGADETH Listening Event Friday, January 23, 2026 5:00 PM 6:00 PM 17:00 18:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us to listen to the new Megadeth album on Friday January 23rd at 5 pm! We’ll have some “with-purchase” items to give out and everyone can enter to win the grand prize of SIGNED POSTER that we’ll pull raffle style at the end of event. View Event → 0 Likes Share Jan 16 5:00 PM17:00 MADISON BEER Listening Event Friday, January 16, 2026 5:00 PM 6:00 PM 17:00 18:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us on Friday January 16th at 5 pm to listen to the new Madison Beer album “Locket” with other fans! We will have some swag to give out while supplies last, and there will be a raffle for a SIGNED LP that we will pull at the end of event. We will also have some copies of the LP and CD for sale at the event. All are welcome! View Event → 0 Likes Share Nov 28 10:00 AM10:00 RSD Black Friday 11/28/25 Friday, November 28, 2025 10:00 AM 8:00 PM 10:00 20:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS We will be participating in this year’s RSD Black Friday event on 11/28/25 (the day after Thanksgiving). We’ll be opening up at 10 am, and will put out of special releases first thing in the morning. All are first come- first served and we do put out a list of every item (and quantity of each) the day before Thanksgiving, so that you’ll know what you’re up against. We are not allowed to hold anything or take pre-orders on RSD titles. Please look over the full list so you can see what is being offered this year: CLICK HERE FOR FULL LIST! View Event → 0 Likes Share Nov 21 6:00 PM18:00 Replacements Let it Be Listening Party Friday, November 21, 2025 6:00 PM 7:00 PM 18:00 19:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us for a Replacements listening party for the deluxe reissue of the Let it Be vinyl AND Cd! The event will be on Friday 11/21/25 at 6 pm. All are invited to come listen to the full album with other Replacements fans, and at the end we will pull some raffle winners for a special tee shirt! There will be other various giveaways for customers. Follow us on Instagram for most up to date info!Pre-order the vinyl OR Cd HERE to ensure you get a copy on release day ! View Event → 0 Likes Share Nov 19 6:45 PM18:45 SYDNEY ROSE In-store and signing Wednesday, November 19, 2025 6:45 PM 8:30 PM 18:45 20:30 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Click here to purchase the vinyl now! (this will give you entry to the event) View Event → 0 Likes Share Nov 18 7:00 PM19:00 LIAM ST JOHN In-store and signing Tuesday, November 18, 2025 7:00 PM 8:00 PM 19:00 20:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us here at Repo on Tuesday 11/18 for a live acoustic set by Liam St John. Entry will require a purchase of the vinyl : HERE , that you will also be able to get signed by Liam after the event. Only pre-sales will get guaranteed entry to this event…in case we don’t sell out , we will then start allowing day-of sales. View Event → 0 Likes Share Nov 5 6:00 PM18:00 HAYLEY WILLIAMS Ego Nite Early Listening Party Wednesday, November 5, 2025 6:00 PM 7:00 PM 18:00 19:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us on 11/5/25 for EGO NITE, a Hayley Williams early listening event for her new solo album out on 11/7/25. This one has lots of great giveaways so make sure to follow us on instagram (@reporecords) for most up to date info on that. You will also be able to purchase and TAKE HOME the vinyl/CD after the party (2 days before street date) whie supplies last. We do have a pre-order up on our site NOW if you’d like to lock in a copy in advance here: Pre-Order Ego Death here! This one may be a “line- up out front” style event since we expect the demand for this to be on higher side. Stay tuned for updates! View Event → 0 Likes Share Oct 31 6:00 PM18:00 FLORENCE AND THE MACHINE Listening Party Friday, October 31, 2025 6:00 PM 7:00 PM 18:00 19:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us for a special Halloween 10/31 Florence and the Machine listening party here at Repo. Event will start at 6 and attendees will be able to hear the whole album played in the store, receive special giveaways and enter a raffle. This special raffle will have TWO winners…one picked at random and one for BEST COSTUME. So although cotumes are not mandatory, we do encourage dressing up! All are welcome, and no purchase necessary to come to this event. View Event → 0 Likes Share Oct 25 10:00 AM10:00 RECORD RIOT Block Party on South Street Saturday, October 25, 2025 10:00 AM 5:00 PM 10:00 17:00 Repo Records (map) Google Calendar ICS Join us on Saturday 10/25/25 for another RECORD RIOT here on the 500 block of South Street from 10 am- 5 pm. There will be record/vintage/jewelry vendors, music and more. If you’re interested in vending, please go to the Record Riot website and contact Steve for more info. This is a free event to attend and also is the same day as the South Street Halloween candy crawl, so expect costumes, candy and more. Hope to see you all there! title: Contact — REPO RECORDS
